name: treatment of bottom ash, MSWI[F], waste rubber, unspecified, slag compartment | bottom ash, MSWI[F], waste rubber, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/27828/documentation

The process represents the treatment of controlled landfilling in slag compartment of a waste (bottom ash) that is exclusively generated in another waste treatment. Bottom ash is the by-product that is generated during the municipal solid waste incineration (MSWI) of 'waste rubber, unspecified'. Recommended use of this dataset: to be used within the specific chain of treatments for 'waste rubber, unspecified'. Share of biogenic carbon in the sludge: 0%.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity ends with the waste being treated and waste-specific emissions from the slag compartment landfill are released to water (short-term emissions to surface water and long-term emissions to ground water).
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters affecting the treatment technology are specific to this geography and to the technology mix encountered in Switzerland in 2000.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Slag compartment for bottom ash from incineration with base seal and leachate collection system (Landfill type D). Recultivation after closure.
